key.name: thumb-size
key.description: Maximum horizontal size of the thumbnail (in pixel). (50 - 1500)

key.name: show-delay
key.description: Time before the thumbnail preview is faded in (in ms). (100 - 10000)

key.name: border
key.description: Size of thumbnail window preview border (in pixel). (1 - 32)

key.name: thumb-color
key.description: Border glow color and opacity or opacity of the window like black background.

key.name: window-like
key.description: Render a black, window-like background instead of the background glow.

key.name: mipmap
key.description: Generate mipmaps for higher quality texture scaling, if possible.

key.name: current-viewport
key.description: Enable this, if your dock, launcher or taskbar is set to show only windows of the current viewport.

key.name: title-enabled
key.description: Render window title text below the thumbnail.

key.name: font-bold
key.description: Use a bold font to render the window title.

key.name: text-distance
key.description: The gap between the thumbnail and the window title text (in pixel). (0 - 32)

key.name: font-size
key.description: The size of the window title (in pixel). (6 - 36)

key.name: font-color
key.description: Color and opacity of the window title font.

key.name: font-background-color
key.description: Color and opacity of the filled rounded rectangle font background.
